content.question:
Assume that the Boolean variable hot is assigned the value true and the Boolean variable humid is assigned the value false. Which of the following will display the value true ?
Select two answers.

choices.label: The figure presents one block of code that consists of 2 lines. Throughout the code there are nested blocks of code, as follows. [Begin Block] Line 1: IF [begin block] hot [end block] [Begin Block] Line 2: [begin block] DISPLAY [begin block] hot AND humid [end block] [end block] [End Block] [End Block]

The figure presents one block of code that consists of 2 lines. Throughout the code there are nested blocks of code, as follows. [Begin Block] Line 1: IF [begin block] NOT humid [end block] [Begin Block] Line 2: [begin block] DISPLAY [begin block] hot OR humid [end block] [end block] [End Block] [End Block]

The figure presents one block of code that consists of 2 lines. Throughout the code there are nested blocks of code, as follows. [Begin Block] Line 1: IF [begin block] hot OR humid [end block] [Begin Block] Line 2: [begin block] DISPLAY [begin block] hot [end block] [end block] [End Block] [End Block]

The figure presents one block of code that consists of 2 lines. Throughout the code there are nested blocks of code. [Begin Block] Line 1: IF [begin block] hot AND humid [end block] [Begin Block] Line 2: [begin block] DISPLAY [begin block] hot [end block] [end block] [End Block] [End Block]

content.answer: The figure presents one block of code that consists of 2 lines. Throughout the code there are nested blocks of code, as follows. [Begin Block] Line 1: IF [begin block] NOT humid [end block] [Begin Block] Line 2: [begin block] DISPLAY [begin block] hot OR humid [end block] [end block] [End Block] [End Block]

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Determine the result of code segments.
